group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All patients who participated in the study signed an informed consent and all samples were collected analyzed in accordance with the World Medical Association Declaration of Helsinki. This study was approved by the Ethics Committees of the University of Palermo and the Montreal Neurological Institute and Hospital (IRB00010120).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Resulting patient data have been de-identified and are suitable for publication.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: NK is a paid consultant of Rescindo Therapeutics. The remaining authors report no conflicts of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.

title: Mutations in ATP13A2 (PARK9) are associated with an amyotrophic lateral sclerosis-like phenotype, implicating this locus in further phenotypic expansion
